title: Books Laravel Api
desciption: This repository manages books using Laravel as a REST API, allowing adding, updating, deleting, and listing books while following Laravel best practices for efficiency and robustness.

title: Dxf downloader and uploader
desciption: React application with Laravel as a Rest Api for downloading, uploading, and displaying dxf and picture files.

title: Realtime messaging application
desciption: This is a Realtime Chat Application built with Laravel Livewire, Tailwind CSS, and Reverb for managing real time messages when messaging you friends and loved ones.

title: eCommerce System
desciption: eCommerce application system using Laravel as API server and React as client frontend

title: Shopping Cart
desciption: Advanced shopping cart using react and typescript

title: Project Management System
desciption: Permission and role based project management using RILT stack (React, Inertia, Laravel, Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI for reusable components)
